item.title: 由于个人电脑需求依然疲软，联想营收再次下滑
item.description:
China's Lenovo Group Ltd (0992.HK) on Thursday posted a 16% fall in revenue for the three months through September, meeting market expectations, as supply for personal computers (PCs) continued to outstrip demand.翻译:中国联想集团有限公司（0992.HK）周四公布，截至 9 月份的三个月收入下降 16%，符合市场预期，因个人电脑 (PC) 供应继续超过需求。

Lenovo's quarterly revenue fell 16% to $14.41 billion from the same period last year, marking the fifth consecutive quarter that the world's largest PC maker has suffered a sales decline as it continues to digest excess inventory accumulated during the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:联想季度营收较去年同期下降16%，至144.1亿美元，这标志着这家全球最大的PC制造商因继续消化在COVID-19大流行期间积累的过剩库存而连续第五个季度出现销量下滑。

The result compared with the $14.45 billion average of seven analyst estimates compiled by LSEG.翻译:该结果与 LSEG 七位分析师的平均预测值 144.5 亿美元相比。

In May, Lenovo reported 14% revenue decline for the year through March, its first annual fall since 2019, following a pandemic-induced boom for electronics manufacturers.翻译:5 月份，联想报告称，截至 3 月份的全年收入下降了 14%，这是自 2019 年以来首次出现年度下滑，原因是大流行引发了电子制造商的繁荣。

The COVID-19 outbreak brought a surge in both enterprise and personal electronics sales as the world embraced remote work. However, revenue started contracting last year as supply began to outstrip demand.翻译:随着世界各地接受远程工作，COVID-19 的爆发带来了企业和个人电子产品销售的激增。然而，随着供应开始超过需求，去年收入开​​始萎缩。

Worldwide PC shipments fell 7% in the second quarter of 2023, showed data from researcher Canalys. Quarterly shipment decline surpassed 30% late last year but the pace has slowed in recent quarters.翻译:研究机构 Canalys 的数据显示，2023 年第二季度全球个人电脑出货量下降 7%。去年末季度出货量下降超过 30%，但最近几个季度下降速度有所放缓。

To help lift PC sales, Lenovo aims to release its first "AI PC" - or PC that can make use of artificial intelligence (AI) without the internet - in the second half of next year, said Chairman Yang Yuanqing.翻译:董事长杨元庆表示，为了帮助提升个人电脑销量，联想计划在明年下半年推出首款“人工智能个人电脑”，即可以在没有互联网的情况下使用人工智能（AI）的个人电脑。

"We definitely believe that this new category of PC will bring value to our users and customers and boost another round of sales in PCs," Yang told Reuters in an interview.翻译:杨在接受路透社采访时表示：“我们坚信，这种新的个人电脑类别将为我们的用户和客户带来价值，并推动新一轮的个人电脑销售。”

A key selling point of AI PCs is that users will not need to send data to the cloud to use generative AI tools, better protecting user privacy.翻译:AI PC的一个关键卖点是用户无需将数据发送到云端即可使用生成式AI工具，更好地保护用户隐私。

Yang said Lenovo is still evaluating any impact of new U.S. curbs on AI chip exports, which barred U.S. chipmaker Nvidia (NVDA.O) from selling many bleeding-edge AI chips to China.翻译:杨表示，联想仍在评估美国对人工智能芯片出口的新限制的影响，该限制禁止美国芯片制造商英伟达（NVDA.O）向中国出售许多尖端人工智能芯片。

"The new U.S. regulations only restrict the high-end GPUs, (graphics processing units) particularly for AI training. But it's not all the chips," he said. "We have a very broad and comprehensive cooperation with Nvidia in gaming PCs, in workstations and in high-performance computing. I think, definitely, this business will not be impacted."

BEYOND PC

To improve profit margins, Lenovo has also been expanding non-PC businesses, such as smartphones, servers and information technology (IT) services.翻译:为了提高利润率，联想还一直在扩大非个人电脑业务，例如智能手机、服务器和信息技术（IT）服务。

Throughout the first half of its fiscal year, revenue from Lenovo's digital solution service business rose 14% to $3.6 billion.翻译:整个财年上半年，联想数字解决方案服务业务收入增长14%，达到36亿美元。

Overall net income attributable to shareholders in the second fiscal quarter fell 60% to $249 million versus analysts' $235 million estimate.翻译:第二财季股东应占净利润总体下降 60%，至 2.49 亿美元，而分析师预期为 2.35 亿美元。

The price of Lenovo shares fell 2.86% in early afternoon trading in Hong Kong following the earnings release, compared with a 1.42% decline in the benchmark index (.HSI).翻译:财报发布后，联想股价在香港午后交易中下跌 2.86%，而基准指数(.HSI)则下跌 1.42%。

Reporting by Josh Ye; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:乔希·叶报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 美国与IPEF合作伙伴就清洁能源、反腐败支柱达成一致
item.description:
Countries in the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework have agreed on two more "pillars" of the initiative, covering cooperation on clean energy and anti-corruption measures, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Thursday.翻译:美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多周四表示，美国主导的印太经济框架国家已就该倡议的另外两个“支柱”达成一致，其中包括清洁能源合作和反腐败措施。

Ministers from the 14 IPEF countries also formally signed the previously agreed text of a third pillar, covering supply chain resiliency, at a meeting during the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation leaders' summit in San Francisco.翻译:在旧金山举行的亚太经济合作组织领导人峰会期间，来自 14 个 IPEF 国家的部长们还在一次会议上正式签署了先前商定的第三个支柱文本，内容涉及供应链弹性。

The agreements on three of the four IPEF pillars leaves the initiative's trade pillar in limbo, after negotiations over the past week failed to produce a deal.翻译:在过去一周的谈判未能达成协议后，IPEF 四大支柱中的三项协议使得该倡议的贸易支柱陷入困境。

The lack of an IPEF trade deal is a setback for the Biden administration. It had aimed to showcase the initiative during the APEC summit as a symbol of its economic re-engagement in Asia, providing countries a counterweight to China's growing clout in the region.翻译:缺乏 IPEF 贸易协议对拜登政府来说是一个挫折。它的目的是在亚太经合组织峰会期间展示这一倡议，作为其重新参与亚洲经济的象征，为各国提供制衡中国在该地区日益增长的影响力的力量。

But Raimondo said that the progress on supply chains, clean energy and anti-corruption had generated "tons of enthusiasm" from IPEF partners.翻译:但雷蒙多表示，供应链、清洁能源和反腐败方面的进展激发了 IPEF 合作伙伴的“极大热情”。

IPEF "is solving problems in supply chains, in infrastructure, in climate that are highly relevant to our partners," Raimondo said.翻译:雷蒙多表示，IPEF“正在解决与我们的合作伙伴高度相关的供应链、基础设施和气候方面的问题”。

The member countries also signed off on an "overarching agreement" that Raimondo said will make IPEF more "durable" by creating a ministerial-level council to review and manage all four pillars, with meetings annually. It also creates a separate commission that focuses on the Commerce-led pillars.翻译:成员国还签署了一项“总体协议”，雷蒙多表示，该协议将通过建立一个部长级理事会来审查和管理所有四个支柱，并每年举行会议，从而使 IPEF 更加“持久”。它还设立了一个单独的委员会，专注于商业主导的支柱。

Raimondo said the clean energy agreement will create avenues for more private investment into IPEF member countries to accelerate their transitions to low-carbon energy sources, including a $30 million "catalytic capital fund" that will help develop "bankable" clean energy products and provide countries technical assistance.翻译:雷蒙多表示，清洁能源协议将为更多私人投资进入IPEF成员国创造途径，以加速其向低碳能源转型，其中包括一项3000万美元的“催化资本基金”，该基金将帮助开发“可融资的”清洁能源产品，并为各国提供技术援助。

A separate group of private sector firms and non-profit groups will focus on mobilizing climate investments in IPEF countries, she said.翻译:她说，一个由私营部门公司和非营利组织组成的独立小组将专注于动员 IPEF 国家的气候投资。

On the pillar aimed at fighting corruption and tax evasion, a senior U.S. Commerce Department official said the agreement calls for both legally binding and non-binding requirements for transparency on anti-corruption and tax administration laws.翻译:关于打击腐败和逃税的支柱，美国商务部一位高级官员表示，该协议要求对反腐败和税务管理法的透明度提出具有法律约束力和非约束力的要求。

But the official said there would be no traditional dispute settlement system to enforce compliance with the anti-corruption provisions. Instead, the text calls for new capacity-building tools to help countries develop better institutions and compliance.翻译:但该官员表示，不会有传统的争端解决制度来强制遵守反腐败规定。相反，文本呼吁新的能力建设工具来帮助各国建立更好的制度和合规性。

Countries participating in IPEF are Australia, Brunei, Fiji, India, Indonesia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, New Zealand, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam and the United States. All but India and Fiji are also members of APEC.翻译:参加IPEF的国家有澳大利亚、文莱、斐济、印度、印度尼西亚、日本、韩国、马来西亚、新西兰、菲律宾、新加坡、泰国、越南和美国。除印度和斐济外，所有国家都是亚太经合组织成员。

Reporting by David Lawder; editing by Christina Fincher翻译:大卫·劳德报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 中国习近平表示支持特斯拉在中国的发展
item.description:
China's President Xi Jinping told Tesla (TSLA.O) CEO Elon Musk that he supports Tesla's development in China, according to a statement from the auto maker's Weibo Account on Thursday.翻译:据特斯拉微博账户周四发布的声明，中国国家主席习近平向特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克表示，他支持特斯拉在中国的发展。

Musk expressed his gratitude, and praised the rapid development of China's new energy vehicle sector, according to the statement.翻译:马斯克对此表示感谢，并对中国新能源汽车行业的快速发展表示赞赏。

Xi met Musk on Nov. 15 in San Francisco.翻译:习近平于 11 月 15 日在旧金山会见了马斯克。

item.title: 西门子第四季度销售前景创历史新高
item.description:
Summary:
  • Company expects sales to grow 4-8% in fiscal 2024
  • Posts record industrial sales, profit in Q4
  • Shares rise as much as 6.6%
翻译:概括：
  • 公司预计 2024 财年销售额将增长 4-8%
  • 第四季度工业销售额和利润创历史新高
  • 股价上涨6.6%

Siemens (SIEGn.DE) on Thursday said sales growth would slow in 2024 but still beat expectations with an outlook that factors in continuing destocking by customers in its key market China, sending shares to their highest in more than three months.翻译:西门子(SIEGn.DE)周四表示，2024 年销售增长将放缓，但仍超出预期，考虑到其主要市场中国客户继续去库存，该公司股价升至三个多月以来的最高水平。

The German group, whose products are used to automate factories and buildings, said it expected revenue growth of 4-8% in the next 12 months, less than the 11% increase recorded for its 2023 business year.翻译:这家产品用于工厂和建筑自动化的德国集团表示，预计未来 12 个月收入增长 4-8%，低于 2023 财年 11% 的增幅。

But that's still significantly higher than the 3.7% LSEG estimate, causing Siemens shares to rise as much as 6.6% to the top of Germany's blue-chip index (.GDAXI) and making them the second-biggest gainers on the pan European STOXX 600 (.STOXX).翻译:但这仍显着高于伦敦证券交易所 3.7% 的预期，导致西门子股价上涨 6.6%，位居德国蓝筹指数(.GDAXI)之首，并成为泛欧 STOXX 600 指数中第二大涨幅（ .STOXX) .

At its key industrial automation unit, the group expects "soft economic development with sluggish demand - especially in China and Germany – and with destocking in key countries" in the first half of fiscal 2024, finance chief Ralf Thomas said.翻译:财务主管拉尔夫·托马斯 (Ralf Thomas) 表示，该集团的主要工业自动化部门预计 2024 财年上半年“经济发展疲软，需求低迷（尤其是中国和德国），并且主要国家将去库存”。

"We assume that improving trends will begin to materialize in the second half of fiscal 2024," he told journalists at the group's annual press conference.翻译:他在该集团年度新闻发布会上对记者表示：“我们认为改善趋势将在 2024 财年下半年开始显现。”

Siemens is the latest company to highlight tougher market conditions, with Swiss rival ABB (ABBN.S) last month flagging falling orders in China.翻译:西门子是最新一家强调市场形势更加严峻的公司，瑞士竞争对手 ABB (ABBN.S) 上个月表示中国订单下降。

Shares were supported by record results for the July-September quarter, which showed sales rising 10% to 21.4 billion euros ($23.19 billion), beating the 20.99 billion euros forecast in a company-gathered poll of analysts.翻译:股价受到 7 月至 9 月季度创纪录业绩的支撑，该季度销售额增长 10%，达到 214 亿欧元（231.9 亿美元），超过公司收集的分析师调查中预测的 209.9 亿欧元。

Industrial profit too grew 7% to a record 3.4 billion euros, above the 3.34 billion euros forecast.翻译:工业利润也增长 7%，达到创纪录的 34 亿欧元，高于预期的 33.4 亿欧元。

"Siemens beat on all metrics in Q4," analysts at Deutsche Bank wrote, also pointing to the group's "outstanding" record free cash flow of 10 billion euros.翻译:德意志银行分析师写道：“第四季度，西门子在所有指标上均表现出色。”他还指出，该集团自由现金流创下了 100 亿欧元的“出色”记录。

Siemens has been seeing demand levels return to normal in recent months after a post-pandemic jump when customers ramped up production and pre-ordered in bulk to avoid shortages of key components.翻译:近几个月来，西门子的需求水平在疫情后猛增后已恢复正常，当时客户提高了产量并批量预订，以避免关键零部件短缺。

The company has also been working through its massive order book, which stood at 111 billion euros at the end of September, up from 110 billion euros at the end of June.翻译:该公司还一直在努力处理其庞大的订单，截至 9 月底，订单总额为 1,110 亿欧元，高于 6 月底的 1,100 亿欧元。

Siemens AG's strong results come a day after former division Siemens Energy (ENR1n.DE) unveiled a $5 billion net loss along with an agreement around 15 billion euros in project-related guarantees also supported by Siemens.翻译:西门子股份公司公布强劲业绩的前一天，前子公司西门子能源(ENR1n.DE)公布了50 亿美元的净亏损，以及一项由西门子支持的约 150 亿欧元项目相关担保协议。

Busch said Siemens AG would continue to reduce the 25.1% stake it still holds in Siemens Energy, currently worth 2.18 billion euros, adding this would happen with market conditions in mind.翻译:布施表示，西门子股份公司将继续减持其仍持有的西门子能源公司25.1%的股份，目前价值21.8亿欧元，并补充说，这将根据市场情况进行。

($1 = 0.9228 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9228 欧元）

item.title: 中国煤炭公司办公室死亡人数上升至26人；至少38人受伤
item.description:
A fire that erupted in the office of a coal company in northern China has now killed 26 people, state media said on Thursday, raising the death toll from the latest in a series of deadly accidents to befall the coal industry.翻译:官方媒体周四称，中国北方一家煤炭公司办公室发生火灾，目前已造成 26 人死亡，这使得煤炭行业发生的一系列致命事故中最新的死亡人数有所上升。

President Xi Jinping, on a trip to the United States, urged the authorities to ensure more safety measures are put in place to avoid such incidents, the state-run Xinhua news agency said.翻译:据官方媒体新华社报道，正在美国访问的国家主席习近平敦促当局确保采取更多安全措施，以避免此类事件发生。

At least 38 people were injured in the blaze, which broke out at 6:50 a.m. (2250 GMT Wednesday) at the four-storey Yongju Coal Industry Joint Building in the country's top coal-producing hub of Shanxi. Calls to the company were not answered.翻译:火灾于早上 6 点 50 分（格林威治标准时间周三 2250 点）在中国最大的煤炭生产中心山西省的四层永州煤业联合大楼发生，造成至少 38 人受伤。拨打该公司的电话无人接听。

State broadcaster CCTV initially reported that the fire had killed 11 people and injured at least 51.翻译:国家电视台中央电视台最初报道称，火灾已造成 11 人死亡、至少 51 人受伤。

Police have detained several people for questioning, CCTV said, adding that the cause of the blaze was being investigated.翻译:中央电视台称，警方已拘留数人进行审问，并补充说起火原因正在调查中。

China's State Council has dispatched a team to the scene to guide the rescue and emergency response work, CCTV said.翻译:据央视报道，中国国务院已派出工作组赶赴现场指导救援和应急处置工作。

China's coal producers are under scrutiny for a series of accidents in mines in recent months, which has weighed on production as mines stop work for safety inspections.翻译:近几个月来，中国煤炭生产商因发生一系列煤矿事故而受到审查，由于煤矿停工进行安全检查，这些事故对生产造成了压力。

In April, 29 people were killed as a fire ripped through a hospital in Beijing, leading to criticism of local authorities on social media sites.翻译:4 月， 北京一家医院发生火灾，造成 29 人死亡，社交媒体网站上批评地方当局。

Reporting by Colleen Howe, Ella Cao and Andrew Hayley; Editing by Miral Fahmy and Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:科琳·豪 (Colleen Howe)、艾拉·曹 (Ella Cao) 和安德鲁·海莉 (Andrew Hayley) 报道； Miral Fahmy 和 Muralikumar Anantharaman 编辑

item.title: 从间谍气球到巧克力：中国宣传框架习近平的美国战略重心
item.description:
What a difference eight months makes: In March, shortly after the U.S. shot down a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon, President Xi Jinping blamed it for challenges faced by China's economy, complaining of "all-round containment".翻译:八个月的变化有多大：3月份，在美国击落一个疑似中国监视气球后不久，习近平主席将中国经济面临的挑战归咎于美国，抱怨“全方位遏制”。

Then on Wednesday, U.S. President Joe Biden and Xi agreed to open a presidential hotline, resume military-to-military communications and work to curb fentanyl production, showing tangible progress in their first face-to-face talks in a year at a summit in California.翻译:随后在周三，美国总统乔·拜登和习近平同意开通总统热线，恢复军方间的沟通，并努力遏制芬太尼生产，这在他们一年来在峰会上首次面对面会谈中取得了切实进展。加利福尼亚州。

While key issues like U.S. sanctions on chip exports remain unresolved, Chinese state media is now striking a different tone, focusing on Xi's smile during past trips to Iowa, fireside chats with its residents, and sharing chocolates with Biden.翻译:尽管美国对芯片出口的制裁等关键问题仍未解决，但中国官方媒体现在却采取了不同的语气，重点关注习近平过去访问爱荷华州时的微笑、与居民的炉边谈话以及与拜登分享巧克力。

Clips from the summit on China's social media show the two leaders walking in gardens at the site of the talks, and chatting by Xi's official limousine, with discussion of U.S. tech curbs and tension over Taiwan featuring less prominently.翻译:中国社交媒体上的峰会片段显示，两位领导人在会谈现场的花园中散步，并在习近平的官方豪华轿车上聊天，而有关美国科技限制和台湾紧张局势的讨论则不那么突出。

The Chinese rhetoric seeks to show Xi to a domestic audience as Biden's equal and highlights his desire to stabilise ties as China grapples with a moribund economy, analysts say. It also sends a signal of approval to the bureaucracy and businesses on engaging with Americans.翻译:分析人士称，中国的言论旨在向国内观众展示习近平与拜登的平等地位，并强调他在中国应对垂死的经济之际稳定关系的愿望。它还向官僚机构和企业发出了批准与美国人接触的信号。

"It reflects a very strong desire on the part of Chinese leaders to stabilise relations with the U.S. and push for more cooperation," said Li Mingjiang, international relations scholar at the Rajaratnam School of International Studies in Singapore.翻译:新加坡拉惹勒南国际关系学院国际关系学者李明江表示：“这反映了中国领导人稳定与美国关系、推动更多合作的强烈愿望。”

"There's this fundamental message in the Chinese narrative that the Chinese leader is capable of managing China-U.S. relations ... he is the one who gives instructions to the U.S. and the American leadership on how to manage the bilateral ties."翻译:“中国的叙述中有一个基本信息，那就是中国领导人有能力管理中美关系……他是向美国和美国领导人指示如何管理双边关系的人。”

China's domestic propaganda machine worked overtime to pave the way for Xi's pivot, also evident at a dinner with U.S. executives, when he pledged that China was ready to be a "partner and friend" of the U.S. and there was "plenty of room for bilateral cooperation".翻译:中国的国内宣传机器加班加点地为习近平的转向铺平道路，这一点在与美国高管的一次晚宴上也可见一斑，当时他承诺中国已准备好成为美国的“伙伴和朋友”，并且“双边关系有足够的空间”。合作”。

With official ties still strained, Chinese state media has focused on relations between the people and emphasised the potential for cooperation and importance of the summit for the Asia-Pacific region.翻译:在官方关系仍然紧张的情况下，中国官方媒体将重点放在人民之间的关系上，并强调了亚太地区合作的潜力和峰会的重要性。

"The international community watches with bated breath, recognising the weight of this meeting," the state news agency Xinhua said in an editorial. "When China-U.S. relations are good, the region benefits; when relations sour, the region suffers."

'AMERICAN FRIENDS'

Xinhua also ran a 1,500-word report reminiscing about Xi's past visits to the U.S..翻译:新华社还发表了1500字的报道，回忆习近平历次访美经历。

"Xi never forgets his American friends and believes that people hold the key to state-to-state relations," the news agency said.翻译:该通讯社称：“习近平永远不会忘记他的美国朋友，并相信国家关系的关键在于人民。”

The report cited Iowans who helped coordinate a 1985 trip Xi made to the state as a young official, describing his "smile that would not stop", and lauding his curiosity. It also described Biden and Xi sampling chocolates from a box during a past exchange.翻译:报告援引爱荷华州人的话说，他们曾帮助协调习近平 1985 年作为一名年轻官员访问该州，描述了他的“笑容不会停止”，并赞扬了他的好奇心。它还描述了拜登和习近平在过去的一次交流中从盒子里品尝巧克力的情况。

Gary Dvorchak, an Iowan considered by Xi an old friend of China, said Xi's fondness for Iowa was genuine but that the Chinese leader also used his ties to the state for propaganda value.翻译:被习近平视为中国老朋友的爱荷华州人加里·德沃尔恰克(Gary Dvorchak)表示，习近平对爱荷华州的喜爱是真诚的，但中国领导人也利用他与该州的关系来达到宣传目的。

“It humanises him and it gives him an ability to show a connection to the American people and bypass the American media,” said Dvorchak.翻译:德沃查克说：“这让他变得人性化，让他能够绕过美国媒体，展现出与美国人民的联系。”

“They use it when they need to bolster his support domestically or internationally,” said Dvorchak, who said he thought it was canny public relations.翻译:德沃查克说：“当他们需要在国内或国际上支持他时，他们就会使用它。”他说，他认为这是精明的公共关系。

“Part of the reason it works is because those feelings are real.”翻译:“它之所以有效，部分原因是因为这些感觉是真实的。”

But even on censored Chinese social media users found ways to make critical comments on the tone of the official commentary.翻译:但即使是在受到审查的中国社交媒体上，用户也找到了对官方评论语气发表批评性评论的方法。

"Where did the relations improve? Tariffs, chips, studying overseas, none of these are mentioned."翻译:“关系改善在哪里？关税、芯片、留学，这些都没有提到。”

On the Weibo Chinese microblogging site, the most popular hashtag on Thursday still harked back to tension over Taiwan: "China must be and will be reunified."翻译:在中国的微博网站微博上，周四最受欢迎的话题标签仍然让人回想起台湾的紧张局势：“中国必须而且将会统一。”

Additional reporting by Albee Zhang and Beijing newsroom, Michael Martina in Washington and Greg Torode in Hong Kong; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Albee 张和北京新闻编辑部、华盛顿的 Michael Martina 和香港的 Greg Torode 进行了补充报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 习近平告诉美国公司中国准备成为合作伙伴和朋友
item.description:
Summary:
  • Xi attends dinner with US executives, officials
  • Apple, BlackRock, Pfizer among the firms represented
  • Controversy over reported high ticket cost
翻译:概括：
  • 习近平与美国高管和官员共进晚餐
  • 代表公司包括苹果、贝莱德、辉瑞
  • 票价高引发争议

China is ready to be a partner and friend of the United States, and there is plenty of room for bilateral cooperation, President Xi Jinping told American executives in San Francisco on Wednesday, as Beijing looks to reassure global business and counter his country's struggles to entice foreign investment.翻译:周三，国家主席习近平在旧金山对美国高管表示，中国已准备好成为美国的伙伴和朋友，双边合作还有很大空间，北京方面希望安抚全球企业，并应对中国在吸引全球企业方面的努力。外来投资。

The U.S. executives dined with Xi on the margins of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum following a day of talks between Xi and U.S. President Joe Biden, aimed at steadying relations between the world's two largest economies.翻译:在习近平与美国总统乔·拜登进行了一天的会谈后，美国高管在亚太经合组织（APEC）论坛间隙与习近平共进晚餐，会谈旨在稳定世界两大经济体之间的关系。

Xi received a standing ovation as he entered the room, and two more before and after he took the stage to speak.翻译:习近平一走进房间就受到了全场起立鼓掌，在他上台讲话前后，又有两次起立鼓掌。

The world needs China and the U.S. to work together, and it is wrong to view China as a threat and play a zero-sum game against it, Xi said in a speech to the audience, including some hand-picked by Beijing.翻译:习近平在向观众发表的讲话中表示，世界需要中美共同努力，将中国视为威胁并与之玩零和游戏的做法是错误的。

"Whatever stage of development it may reach, China will never pursue hegemony or expansion, and will never impose its will on others. China does not seek spheres of influence, and will not fight a cold war or a hot war with anyone," Xi said.翻译:“无论发展到什么阶段，中国永远不称霸、永远不扩张，永远不会把自己的意志强加于人。中国不谋求势力范围，不会同任何人打冷战、热战。”说。

He assured his audience that "no matter how the global landscape evolves, the historical trend of peaceful coexistence between China and the United States will not change."翻译:他向观众保证，“无论世界格局如何变化，中美和平共处的历史潮流都不会改变”。

Xi's optimistic tone toward relations with the U.S. was at odds with the negative chorus of voices in Washington, where the U.S. Congress finds unusual bipartisan consensus in the need to counter Beijing.翻译:习近平对中美关系的乐观态度与华盛顿的负面声音不一致，美国国会发现两党在对抗北京方面达成了不同寻常的共识。

The high-security dinner was a chance for companies to hear directly from China's leader as they search for ways to navigate China's economic slowdown, a U.S. push to "de-risk" some American supply chains away from China, and uncertainty caused by China's expanding security rules.翻译:这次高度安全的晚宴为企业提供了直接听取中国领导人讲话的机会，因为它们正在寻找应对中国经济放缓、美国推动部分美国供应链远离中国“降低风险”以及中国扩张带来的不确定性的方法。安全规则。

But Xi directed much of his speech toward the American people, and spent little time on commercial relations with the U.S.翻译:但习近平的讲话大部分针对的是美国人民，很少讨论与美国的商业关系

"I would like to let you know that China sympathizes deeply with the American people, especially the young, for the sufferings that fentanyl has inflicted upon them," he said.翻译:他说：“我想让你知道，中方对美国人民特别是年轻人因芬太尼给他们造成的痛苦深表同情。”

China and the U.S. reached an agreement to curb fentanyl production in earlier talks between Xi and Biden.翻译:中美两国在习近平和拜登早些时候的会谈中达成了遏制芬太尼生产的协议。

The event attracted nearly 400 people, including government officials and academics. Courses served included coffee-crusted black angus flat iron steak and a vegetable curry with squash and rice.翻译:此次活动吸引了近400人参加，其中包括政府官员和学者。提供的课程包括咖啡皮黑安格斯扁铁牛排和蔬菜咖喱配南瓜和米饭。

Executives from U.S. corporate giants such as Apple's (AAPL.O) Tim Cook, BlackRock's (BLK.N) Laurence Fink, Broadcom's (AVGO.O) Hock Tan, Bridgewater Associates' Ray Dalio and Pfizer's (PFE.N) Albert Bourla were at the dinner tables.

CONTROVERSY

U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo and other senior U.S. officials also attended the event, which generated controversy due to reported high ticket costs for companies seeking to brush shoulders with Xi.翻译:美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多和其他美国高级官员也出席了此次活动，但由于有报道称寻求与习近平擦肩而过的企业票价高昂，此次活动引起了争议。

Mike Gallagher, the Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives' select committee on China, had called it "unconscionable" that American companies would pay thousands of dollars to join a dinner with a government the United States says is committing genocide against Muslim Uyghurs.翻译:美国众议院中国问题特别委员会共和党主席迈克·加拉格尔(Mike Gallagher)称，美国公司愿意支付数千美元与美国称正在对穆斯林维吾尔人实施种族灭绝的政府共进晚餐，这是“不合理的”。

Gallagher sent a letter on Monday to the hosts – the U.S.-China Business Council and the National Committee on U.S.-China Relations – demanding a complete list of individuals and companies that purchased tickets to the dinner.翻译:加拉格尔周一致函东道主美中贸易全国委员会和美中关系全国委员会，要求提供购买晚宴门票的个人和公司的完整名单。

Analysts have said Xi's speech alone is unlikely to dramatically alter U.S. business sentiment about China.翻译:分析人士表示，仅习近平的讲话不太可能大幅改变美国企业对中国的信心。

U.S. and Chinese officials have often described bilateral business and trade relations as the ballast in otherwise contentious ties with the U.S. But the growing economic and geopolitical rivalry between the superpowers has placed companies from both countries in the crosshairs of the other's government.翻译:美国和中国官员经常将双边商业和贸易关系描述为中美其他有争议关系的压舱石。但这两个超级大国之间日益激烈的经济和地缘政治竞争使两国企业成为对方政府的攻击目标。

China has grown more suspicious of engagement with Western companies, in line with Xi's emphasis on self-reliance and national security, and this year it has cracked down on some U.S. consultancy and due-diligence firms, further damaging investor confidence.翻译:随着习近平强调自力更生和国家安全，中国对与西方公司的接触变得更加怀疑，今年中国还打压了一些美国咨询和尽职调查公司，进一步损害了投资者的信心。

But Gary Dvorchak, whose family hosted Xi in Iowa in 1985 when the Chinese leader was a young official, and who was invited by Beijing to attend the dinner, said Xi's appearance was savvy public relations, allowing the ruling Communist Party to show a Chinese domestic audience he has appeal to regular people.翻译:但加里·德沃尔查克(Gary Dvorchak)表示，习近平的出现是精明的公共关系，让执政的共产党展示了中国国内的一面。1985年，习近平的家人在爱荷华州接待了年轻官员，当时中国领导人还是一名年轻官员，并受到北京的邀请参加晚宴。他对普通人具有吸引力。

"It humanizes him and it gives him an ability to show a connection to the American people and bypass the American media," Dvorchak said.翻译:德沃查克说：“这使他变得人性化，使他能够绕过美国媒体，展现出与美国人民的联系。”

Reporting by Michael Martina, Valerie Insinna, Stephen Nellis, Lisa Baertlein, Niket Nishant; Aditional reporting by Ethan Wang and Liz Lee in Beijing; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:Michael Martina、Valerie Insinna、Stephen Nellis、Lisa Baertlein、Niket Nishant 报道； Ethan Wang 和 Liz Lee 在北京的补充报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 独家：凯雷在充满挑战的市场中将亚洲融资目标下调至 60 亿美元
item.description:
U.S investment giant Carlyle Group (CG.O) has lowered the target for its latest pan-Asia private equity fund by at least 30% from its original $8.5 billion, three people with knowledge of the matter said, as a slowing global economy and geopolitical tensions dull investors' appetite.翻译:三名知情人士表示，由于全球经济放缓和地缘政治因素，美国投资巨头凯雷投资集团(Carlyle Group)将其最新泛亚洲私募股权基金的目标从最初的 85 亿美元目标下调了至少 30%。紧张局势削弱了投资者的兴趣。

Carlyle, which started raising its sixth Asia-focused fund in mid-2022, has bagged less than $3 billion so far, two of the sources said.翻译:两名消息人士称，凯雷于 2022 年中期开始筹集第六只专注于亚洲的基金，迄今为止已筹集了不到 30 亿美元。

Carlyle did not disclose to investors why it had lowered the target, the sources said, with one of the people adding that the recent poor performance of funds could be a factor.翻译:消息人士称，凯雷没有向投资者透露降低目标的原因，其中一位人士补充说，近期基金表现不佳可能是一个因素。

Carlyle is now targeting up to $6 billion in total, the sources said. The company is aiming for a final close of the fundraising in the third quarter next year, one of the people said.翻译:消息人士称，凯雷目前的目标总额为 60 亿美元。一位知情人士表示，该公司的目标是在明年第三季度最终完成融资。

All the sources declined to be named as they were not authorised to speak to the media.翻译:所有消息人士均拒绝透露姓名，因为他们无权接受媒体采访。

A Carlyle spokesperson declined to comment.翻译:凯雷发言人拒绝置评。

Carlyle's downsizing comes as private equity firms struggle to cash out on their assets amid volatility caused by conflicts in the Middle East and Europe, rising inflation and higher interest rates, all factors that are expected to crimp global economic growth next year.翻译:凯雷集团裁员之际，私募股权公司在中东和欧洲冲突、通胀上升和利率上升造成的波动中难以兑现其资产，所有这些因素预计将抑制明年的全球经济增长。

It is not immediately clear if Carlyle has already reached first close, which refers to the stage when a private equity firm has secured the bulk of its targeted fundraising amount and can start investing in companies.翻译:目前尚不清楚凯雷是否已经达到首次交割，这是指私募股权公司已获得大部分目标融资金额并可以开始投资公司的阶段。

Investors in private equity companies, known as limited partners, typically reinvest after having booked returns from their previous investments.翻译:私募股权公司的投资者（称为有限合伙人）通常在获得先前投资的回报后进行再投资。

Asia-focused fundraising has fallen nearly three-fourths this year from 2021, Preqin data shows. While funds raised $299 billion in 2021, that amount fell to $154 billion in 2022 and $73 billion so far this year.翻译:Preqin 数据显示，自 2021 年以来，今年以亚洲为重点的筹款额减少了近四分之三。虽然基金在 2021 年筹集了 2,990 亿美元，但到 2022 年这一数字将降至 1,540 亿美元，今年迄今已降至 730 亿美元。

Private equity firms have made a total of $15.6 billion in exits in Asia, down 82% year-on-year, Dealogic data showed.翻译:Dealogic的数据显示，私募股权公司在亚洲的退出总额为156亿美元，同比下降82%。

No China-focused buyout fund denominated in U.S. dollars has been raised this year, Preqin data showed, as China's economic slowdown and Sino-U.S. tensions weighed on investors' appetite for the world's second largest economy.翻译:Preqin数据显示，由于中国经济放缓和中美紧张局势打压了投资者对这个世界第二大经济体的兴趣，今年尚未筹集到以美元计价的中国并购基金。

Sources told Reuters last year Carlyle was aiming to raise $8.5 billion in the pan-Asia fund.

FUND ALLOCATION

If Carlyle hits the downsized $6 billion target, the latest fund would be smaller than its $6.55 billion fifth pan-Asia fund in 2018, which has invested in companies including Jack Ma's Ant Group and India's Yes Bank (YESB.NS).翻译:如果凯雷实现缩减后的 60 亿美元目标，最新基金的规模将小于其 2018 年第五支泛亚洲基金 65.5 亿美元，该基金投资了马云旗下蚂蚁集团和印度 Yes Bank (YESB.NS)等公司。

The new pan-Asia fund will allocate about 30% to 35% of its capital to India, making it Carlyle's largest market in Asia, one of the sources said, adding that 15%-20% will be allocated to China, which is the same allocation range for South Korea.翻译:一位消息人士称，新的泛亚洲基金将把约30%至35%的资本分配给印度，使其成为凯雷在亚洲最大的市场，并补充说，15%-20%将分配给中国，这是凯雷在亚洲的最大市场。韩国的分配范围相同。

Capital allocation to China had been bigger in Carlyle's previous Asia funds, different sources with knowledge of the matter have said.翻译:多位知情人士表示，凯雷之前的亚洲基金对中国的资本配置更大。

Carlyle earlier this month reported a smaller-than-expected 43% year-on-year drop in third-quarter distributable earnings, with its realized performance revenues, mostly driven by asset sales from its private equity unit, plummeting 76%.翻译:凯雷本月早些时候报告称，第三季度可分配收益同比下降43%，低于预期，其实现的业绩收入（主要由私募股权部门的资产出售推动）骤降76%。

Its chief executive Harvey Schwartz, a former Goldman Sachs banker who took charge in February after the previous CEO abruptly left, said at the earnings call that he was not pleased with fundraising in 2023.翻译:其首席执行官哈维·施瓦茨(Harvey Schwartz)是前高盛(Goldman Sachs)银行家，在前任首席执行官突然离职后于2月份上任，他在财报电话会议上表示，他对2023年的融资并不满意。

The firm, across funds globally, raised $6.3 billion from investors during the second quarter. Total assets under management stood at $382 billion, down 1% from the prior quarter.翻译:该公司在全球范围内的基金在第二季度从投资者那里筹集了 63 亿美元。管理总资产为 3,820 亿美元，较上季度下降 1%。

Carlyle is planning to pull back from investing in U.S.-based consumer, media and retail companies as it looks to focus on other key sectors such as technology and financial services, Reuters reported last month.翻译:据路透社上个月报道，凯雷计划撤回对美国消费者、媒体和零售公司的投资，以专注于技术和金融服务等其他关键领域。

Carlyle has also faced senior management changes in Asia in recent months.翻译:近几个月来，凯雷在亚洲也面临着高级管理层的变动。

Patrick Siewert, one of Carlyle's most senior dealmakers in Asia, stepped down as partner and head of consumer, media and retail to become a senior adviser, a Carlyle spokesperson said翻译:凯雷发言人表示，凯雷在亚洲最资深的交易撮合者之一帕特里克·西沃特(Patrick Siewert)辞去了合伙人兼消费者、媒体和零售主管的职务，转而担任高级顾问。

Beijing-based Nina Gong and Hong Kong-based Herman Chang, both managing directors, have also retired, the firm said. Both were with Carlyle for more than a decade cutting deals in Greater China.翻译:该公司表示，常驻北京的龚如心和常驻香港的董事总经理张赫曼也已退休。两人都在凯雷工作了十多年，负责大中华区的交易。

Carlyle's Hong Kong-based private credit team, which was focused on looking into a potential Greater China joint venture, has also "left to pursue other opportunities", the spokesperson said, adding that its Asian private credit business would continue to be managed as part of the global credit team.翻译:该发言人表示，凯雷驻香港的私人信贷团队原本专注于寻找潜在的大中华区合资企业，但也“离开去寻找其他机会”，并补充说，其亚洲私人信贷业务将继续作为集团的一部分进行管理。全球信贷团队的成员。

item.title: 拜登在精心策划的峰会后称习近平为独裁者
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden said on Wednesday he had not changed his view that Chinese President Xi Jinping was effectively a dictator, a comment likely to land with a thud in Beijing after the two leaders held straightforward summit talks.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登周三表示，他没有改变对中国国家主席习近平实际上是独裁者的看法，在两国领导人举行直截了当的峰会会谈后，这一言论可能会在北京引起轰动。

Biden held a solo news conference after four hours of talks with Xi on the outskirts of San Francisco. At the end of the news conference, he was asked whether he still held the view that Xi was a dictator, something he said in June.翻译:拜登在旧金山郊区与习近平进行了四个小时的会谈后举行了单独的新闻发布会。在新闻发布会结束时，他被问到是否仍然认为习近平是独裁者，他在六月份曾说过这样的话。

"Look, he is. He's a dictator in the sense that he's a guy who runs a country that is a communist country that's based on a form of government totally different than ours," Biden said.翻译:“看，他是。从某种意义上说，他是一个独裁者，因为他统治着一个共产主义国家，而这个国家的政府形式与我们的政府完全不同，”拜登说。

In response, China's foreign ministry said it "strongly opposes" the remarks, without mentioning Biden by name.翻译:作为回应，中国外交部表示“强烈反对”上述言论，但没有提及拜登的名字。

"This statement is extremely wrong and irresponsible political manipulation," foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told reporters on Thursday at a routine briefing.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁在周四的例行记者会上对记者说：“这种说法是极其错误的，是不负责任的政治操弄。”

"It should be pointed out that there will always be some people with ulterior motives who attempt to incite and damage U.S.-China relations, they are doomed to fail."翻译:需要指出的是，总会有一些别有用心的人企图煽动和破坏美中关系，他们注定不会得逞。”

Mao refused to specify the identity of "some people" in answer to a follow-up question.翻译:毛泽东在回答后续问题时拒绝具体说明“一些人”的身份。

Last March Xi clinched a third term as president when nearly 3,000 members of China's rubber-stamp parliament, the National People's Congress, voted unanimously for him in an election in which there was no other candidate.翻译:去年3月，习近平获得了国家主席的第三个任期，当时中国橡皮图章议会（全国人民代表大会）的近3000名议员在没有其他候选人的选举中一致投票支持他。

Xi is considered the most powerful Chinese leader since Mao Zedong, after a decade of consolidating power in policy-making and the military, and stifling media freedoms.翻译:习近平被认为是自毛泽东以来最强大的中国领导人， 十年来巩固了决策和军队的权力，并压制了媒体自由。

There was no immediate reaction from the Chinese delegation, which had come to the United States to attend the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in San Francisco. Hundreds of critics of Beijing marched through the city's downtown around noon, chanting "free Tibet" and "free Hong Kong."

When Biden made a similar dictator reference in June, China called the remarks absurd and a provocation. But the spat did not prevent the two sides from holding extensive talks aimed at improving strained relations, which culminated in Wednesday's meeting.翻译:当拜登六月份发表类似的独裁者言论时，中国称其言论荒谬且是挑衅。但这场口角并没有阻止双方举行旨在改善紧张关系的广泛会谈，会谈在周三的会面中达到顶峰。

item.title: 美国原油产量增加、中国需求担忧导致油价下跌
item.description:
Summary:
  • U.S. front-month contract at discount to second-month
  • U.S. crude stocks rise, output holds steady at record
  • China Oct oil refinery runs slow from previous month
  • China's prolonged property gloom weighs on market
翻译:概括：
  • 美国近月合约较二月合约有折扣
  • 美国原油库存上升，产量稳定在历史最高水平
  • 中国10月炼油厂开工较上月缓慢
  • 中国房地产市场长期低迷令市场承压

Oil prices fell on Thursday, extending losses from the previous session, as signals of higher supply from the United States met worries about lackluster energy demand from China.翻译:由于美国供应增加的信号满足了对中国能源需求低迷的担忧，油价周四下跌，延续了前一交易日的跌幅。

Brent futures were down 48 cents at $80.70 a barrel at 0630 GMT. U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude (WTI) shed 53 cents to $76.13 a barrel.翻译:截至 GMT 0630，布伦特原油期货下跌 48 美分，至每桶 80.70 美元。美国西德克萨斯中质原油 (WTI) 下跌 53 美分，至每桶 76.13 美元。

Both benchmarks fell more than 1.5% in the prior session.翻译:前一交易日，两个基准指数均下跌超过 1.5%。

WTI's front-month contract also traded below the price for the second month, a structure known as contango, suggesting that investors expect prices to increase. The front month's discount to the second month traded at minus 17 cents on Thursday.翻译:WTI 近月合约的交易价格也低于第二个月的价格，这种结构被称为期货溢价，表明投资者预计价格将会上涨。周四，即月相对于第二个月的折扣价为负 17 美分。

"Concerns over a record-high U.S. production rate put fresh pressure on oil prices, adding to an already worrisome demand outlook," said Tina Teng, a markets analyst at CMC Markets in Auckland.翻译:奥克兰CMC Markets市场分析师Tina Teng表示，“对美国创纪录高生产率的担忧给油价带来了新的压力，加剧了本已令人担忧的需求前景。”

U.S. crude stocks rose by 3.6 million barrels last week to 421.9 million barrels, according to the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA), far exceeding analysts' expectations in a Reuters poll for a 1.8 million-barrel rise.翻译:美国能源信息署(EIA)的数据显示，上周美国原油库存增加360万桶，至4.219亿桶，远超路透调查中分析师预期的增加180万桶。

U.S. crude production held steady at a record 13.2 million barrels per day (bpd).翻译:美国原油产量稳定在创纪录的 1,320 万桶/日 (bpd)。

In Asia, China's oil refinery throughput eased in October from the previous month's highs as industrial fuel demand weakened and refining margins narrowed. Still, its economic activity perked up in October as industrial output increased at a faster pace and retail sales growth beat expectations.翻译:在亚洲，由于工业燃料需求减弱和炼油利润收窄，10月份中国炼油厂吞吐量较上月高点有所回落。尽管如此，由于工业产出增长更快，零售额增长超出预期，十月份经济活动有所回升。

Data released on Thursday morning underscored concerns around China's property sector, showing that new home prices fell for a fourth consecutive month in October, with property sales by floor area down 20.33% year-on-year.翻译:周四上午公布的数据凸显了人们对中国房地产行业的担忧，显示10月份新建住宅价格连续第四个月下跌，其中商品房销售面积同比下降20.33%。

Technical factors were also restraining any upward movement in prices, said Jun Rong Yeap, a market strategist at IG in Singapore.翻译:IG驻新加坡市场策略师Jun Rong Yeap表示，技术因素也限制了价格的上涨。

"Given that the tighter oil supply-demand dynamics have been less prominent from months ago, there has been some unwinding in previous bullish positioning ever since, with prices falling back below their 200-day moving average as a sign of sellers in control," Yeap said.翻译:“鉴于石油供需动态较几个月前趋紧的情况已不再那么突出，此后此前的看涨头寸有所回撤，价格回落至 200 日移动均线以下，这是卖方掌控局面的迹象。”是的说。

Reporting by Stephanie Kelly and Andrew Hayley; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Edmund Klamann翻译:斯蒂芬妮·凯利和安德鲁·海利报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和埃德蒙·克拉曼

item.title: 中国房地产问题打压市场情绪，亚洲股市下跌
item.description:
Asian stocks fell on Thursday pausing the heavy gains made this week, as fresh Chinese data showed prolonged weakness in the property sector and dented some of the recent optimism about a recovery in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:亚洲股市周四下跌，暂停了本周的大幅上涨，因为最新的中国数据显示房地产行业长期疲软，并削弱了近期对世界第二大经济体复苏的乐观情绪。

While data released this week showed China's industrial and retail sectors making a comeback, a sharp drop in property investment and weak home prices suggest persistent problems in the sector that could drag on the country's overall recovery.翻译:尽管本周公布的数据显示中国工业和零售业正在复苏，但房地产投资大幅下降和房价疲软表明该行业持续存在的问题可能会拖累中国的整体复苏。

Meanwhile, Japanese exports grew for a second straight month in October but at a sharply slower pace due to slumping China-bound shipments of chips and steel.翻译:与此同时，日本十月份出口连续第二个月增长，但由于运往中国的芯片和钢铁出货量大幅下滑，增速大幅放缓。

"The weak economic data from both countries indicate the fact that the global economy is slowing down, highlighting ongoing macro headwinds that businesses face," said Tina Teng, market analyst at CMC Markets.翻译:CMC Markets 市场分析师 Tina Teng 表示：“两国疲弱的经济数据表明全球经济正在放缓，凸显企业面临的持续宏观阻力。”

"China's housing crisis remained a major issue for the economy and weakened global consumer demands will likely continue to press on sentiment."翻译:“中国的住房危机仍然是经济的一个主要问题，而全球消费者需求的疲软可能会继续打压市场情绪。”

European markets were set for a lower open, with pan-region Euro Stoxx 50 futures down 0.21%, German DAX futures falling 0.11% and FTSE futures dropping 0.11%.翻译:欧洲市场低开，泛区欧洲斯托克 50 指数期货下跌 0.21%，德国 DAX 期货下跌 0.11%，富时指数期货下跌 0.11%。

In Asia, MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) was down 0.4% in afternoon trade although the index is up 7.1% so far this month.翻译:在亚洲，摩根士丹利资本国际 (MSCI) 日本以外最广泛的亚太股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)在下午交易中下跌 0.4%，尽管该指数本月迄今已上涨 7.1%。

Australian shares (.AXJO) were down 0.67% as strong wages data indicated that inflationary pressures were still running high. Japan's Nikkei stock index (.N225) slid 0.18% as investors sold stocks to lock in profits from the previous session's sharp gains.翻译:澳大利亚股市(.AXJO)下跌 0.67%，因为强劲的工资数据表明通胀压力仍然很高。日本日经指数（.N225）下跌 0.18%，因投资者抛售股票以锁定前一交易日大幅上涨的利润。

The MSCI Asia ex-Japan index, MSCI Emerging Market index (.MSCIEF) and Nikkei all posted their biggest gains in a year, of 2.5% or more, on Wednesday.翻译:周三，MSCI 亚洲（日本除外）指数、MSCI 新兴市场指数(.MSCIEF)和日经指数均录得一年来最大涨幅，涨幅达 2.5% 或以上。

In China, stocks fell on Thursday partially because investors were disappointed by a top level Sino-U.S. meeting, with Shanghai's blue-chip CSI300 index (.CSI300) down 0.72% and Hong Kong's Hang Seng index (.HSI) dropping 1%.翻译:中国股市周四下跌，部分原因是投资者对中美高层会议感到失望，上海蓝筹股沪深 300 指数(.CSI300)下跌 0.72%，香港恒生指数(.HSI)下跌 1%。

While U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping had agreed to resume military-to-military communications and cooperate on anti-drug policies, a sign ties were improving, some investors were disappointed at the lack of any major breakthroughs in the talks.翻译:尽管美国总统乔·拜登和中国领导人习近平同意恢复军事交流并就禁毒政策进行合作，这表明两国关系正在改善，但一些投资者对谈判没有取得任何重大突破感到失望。

On Wednesday, U.S. stocks closed slightly higher, as inflation data reinforced investor hopes the Fed is done raising interest rates, while retail stocks were boosted by an upbeat forecast from Target.翻译:周三， 美国股市小幅收高，因通胀数据增强了投资者对美联储不再加息的希望，而零售股则因 Target 的乐观预测而受到提振。

The Dow Jones Industrial Average (.DJI) rose 0.47%, the S&P 500 (.SPX) gained 0.16% and the Nasdaq Composite (.IXIC) narrowed earlier gains to end flat.翻译:道琼斯工业平均指数(.DJI)上涨 0.47%，标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)上涨 0.16%，纳斯达克综合指数(.IXIC)收窄早盘涨幅，最终持平。

Money market traders have fully priced in the odds that the U.S. central bank will keep rates steady in December, as per CME Group's Fedwatch tool. They also see the first rate cut of the cycle to kick off in May 2024.翻译:根据芝商所 (CME Group) 的 Fedwatch 工具，货币市场交易员已完全消化了美联储 12 月维持利率稳定的可能性。他们还预计本周期的首次降息将于 2024 年 5 月开始。

Investors are increasingly pricing in more rate cuts next year with bond yields and the dollar coming under downward pressure. Some of that reversed on Wednesday, with Treasury yields and the dollar rebounding slightly from the previous session's fall.翻译:随着债券收益率和美元面临下行压力，投资者越来越多地预计明年将进一步降息。其中一些情况在周三发生了逆转，美国国债收益率和美元从前一交易日的下跌中小幅反弹。

The yield on benchmark 10-year Treasury notes was at 4.5039% compared with its U.S. close of 4.537% on Wednesday. The two-year yield , which rises with traders' expectations of higher Fed fund rates, touched 4.8989%compared with a U.S. close of 4.916%.翻译:基准 10 年期国债收益率为 4.5039%，而周三美国收盘价为 4.537%。随着交易员对联邦基金利率上升的预期而上升，两年期国债收益率触及4.8989%，而美国收盘价为4.916%。

In currencies, the European single currency was up 0.1% on the day at $1.0837, having gained 2.47% in a month, while the dollar index , which tracks the greenback against a basket of currencies of other major trading partners, was up at 104.48.翻译:货币方面，欧洲单一货币当天上涨0.1%至1.0837美元，一个月内上涨2.47%，而追踪美元兑其他主要贸易伙伴一篮子货币的美元指数上涨至104.48。

U.S. crude dipped 0.9% to $75.97 a barrel. Brent crude fell to $80.44 per barrel.翻译:美国原油下跌 0.9% 至每桶 75.97 美元。布伦特原油跌至每桶 80.44 美元。

Gold was slightly higher. Spot gold was traded at $1963.29 per ounce.翻译:黄金小幅走高。现货黄金交易价格为每盎司1963.29美元。

Reporting by Julie Zhu and Vidya Ranganathan; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Sam Holmes翻译:Julie Zhu 和 Vidya Ranganathan 报道；林肯·盛宴和萨姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 深圳世茂土地法院拍卖再次失败
item.description:
A court auction to sell vast commercial land plots owned by defaulted Shimao Group (0813.HK) in Shenzhen failed for a second time on Thursday as there were no bidders, highlighting weak demand in China's property market.翻译:周四，深圳法院拍卖了违约的世茂集团（0813.HK）拥有的大量商业用地，由于没有投标人，第二次拍卖失败，凸显了中国房地产市场的需求疲软。

Twelve land plots totalling 243,602 square metres, together with some uncompleted buildings on them, have asked for 10.4 billion yuan ($1.4 billion), 20% lower than the 13 billion yuan starting price in the first auction in July, according to e-commerce company JD.com's (9618.HK) online auction platform.翻译:据电子商务公司称，总面积为 243,602 平方米的 12 块地块及其上的一些未完工建筑的标价为 104 亿元人民币（14 亿美元），比 7 月份首次拍卖的 130 亿元人民币起拍价低 20%京东（9618.HK）的在线拍卖平台。

China's property sector, which has seen many company defaults since it slipped into a debt crisis in mid-2021, is struggling to stabilise due to a bleak economic outlook.翻译:自2021年年中陷入债务危机以来，中国房地产行业已出现许多公司违约，由于经济前景黯淡，该行业正难以企稳。

The Shenzhen plots were part of the land parcel bought by Shanghai-based Shimao in 2017, which planned to build a new landmark complex in China's tech hub with the city's tallest skyscraper.翻译:深圳地块是上海世茂集团于2017年购买的地块的一部分，世茂集团计划在中国科技中心建设一座新的地标综合体，拥有该市最高的摩天大楼。

Many of the assets of Shimao, which defaulted its $11.8 billion of offshore debt last July, were being sold to raise funds or were seized by creditors.翻译:世茂去年7月拖欠了118亿美元的离岸债务，其许多资产被出售以筹集资金或被债权人扣押。

Media reports said the land plots, valued at 16.3 billion yuan, were the most valuable assets being auctioned by Chinese courts in seven years.翻译:媒体报道称，这些地块价值163亿元人民币，是中国法院七年来拍卖的最有价值的资产。

China's government land sales revenue and property sales both fell at a faster pace in October, down 25.4% and 20.33% respectively from a year earlier, official data showed this week, suggesting the crisis-hit sector is yet to emerge from its decline despite Beijing's support efforts.翻译:本周官方数据显示，10 月份中国政府土地出让收入和房地产销售双双下降，同比分别下降 25.4% 和 20.33%，这表明尽管北京方面支持努力。

Authorities have been ramping up measures to support real estate, including relaxing home purchase restrictions and lowering borrowing costs.翻译:当局一直在加大力度支持房地产，包括放宽购房限制和降低借贷成本。

($1 = 7.2594 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2594 人民币）

item.title: 中国房价连续四个月下跌 或进一步走弱
item.description:
Summary:
  • Prices fall for fourth month in monthly and annual terms
  • More cities record monthly price decline
翻译:概括：
  • 月度和年度价格连续第四个月下跌
  • 更多城市房价月度下跌

China's new home prices fell for the fourth straight month with dozens of cities hit by declines, the most since the peak of the COVID-19 pandemic last year, suggesting a broader weakening in the sector that could drag on the country's overall recovery.翻译:中国的新房价格连续第四个月下跌，数十个城市出现跌幅，这是自去年COVID-19大流行高峰以来的最大跌幅，表明该行业更广泛的疲软可能会拖累该国的整体复苏。

New home prices in October dropped 0.3% month-on-month after a 0.2% dip in September, according to Reuters calculations based on National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) data.翻译:路透社根据国家统计局数据计算，继9月份下降0.2%之后，10月份新建住宅价格环比下降0.3%。

Once a key engine of economic growth accounting for around a quarter of China's economic activity, a regulatory crackdown since 2020 to curb debt has tightened liquidity and raised default risks for developers, delaying many projects.翻译:曾经是经济增长的关键引擎，约占中国经济活动的四分之一，但自2020年以来为遏制债务而实施的监管打压导致流动性收紧，并增加了开发商的违约风险，导致许多项目被推迟。

Authorities have rolled out a flurry of measures to prop up the pivotal sector, including relaxing curbs on home purchases and cutting borrowing costs but homebuyers remain cautious.翻译:当局推出了一系列措施来支撑这一关键行业，包括放宽购房限制和降低借贷成本，但购房者仍保持谨慎态度。

"The most important reason for the bearish home prices is that demand is weak, buyers don't know if pre-sold homes they buy will be delivered on the dates promised by the developers," said Ma Hong, senior analyst at Zhixin Investment Research Institute.翻译:执信投研高级分析师马洪表示，“房价看跌最重要的原因是需求疲软，买家不知道自己购买的预售房能否按开发商承诺的日期交付”。研究所。

Nomura estimated there are around 20 million pre-sold units that are either not yet constructed or delayed. That is equivalent to 20 times the number of unfinished projects by indebted developer Country Garden (2007.HK) as of end-2022.翻译:野村证券估计，约有 2000 万套预售单位尚未建成或已延迟。这相当于负债开发商碧桂园（2007.HK）截至2022年底未完工项目数量的20倍。

Bearish home prices follow data on Wednesday showing some improvement in industrial output and retail sales, which both beat expectations in October, but overall investment growth was tepid and property sales and investment slumped sharply.翻译:周三公布的数据显示，10 月份工业产出和零售销售有所改善，均超出预期，但整体投资增长不温不火，房地产销售和投资大幅下滑，导致房价下跌。

"Residents remain uncertain about income growth, and there are poor returns on financial investments in the country. They are hesitant to buy a big-ticket item like a house," Ma added.翻译:马云补充道：“居民收入增长仍存在不确定性，国内金融投资回报率较低。他们对购买房子等大件物品犹豫不决。”

Out of 70 cities, 56 reported declines in monthly prices last month, marking the most cities number since October 2020, up from 54 in September.

TWIST AND TURNS

House prices in three major cities Beijing, Shenzhen and Guangzhou all fell month-on-month in October.翻译:10月份北京、深圳、广州三大城市房价环比均下跌。

Compared with a year earlier, nationwide prices were down 0.1%, matching a decline in September, August and July.翻译:与去年同期相比，全国价格下降0.1%，与9月、8月和7月的降幅一致。

For existing home, NBS data showed 67 cities posted month-on-month price declines in October, up from 65 in September.翻译:就现房而言，国家统计局数据显示，10 月份有 67 个城市价格环比下降，高于 9 月份的 65 个。

The property market is still in adjustment and transformation, and there will be "twists and turns" in the economic recovery, Liu Aihua, spokesperson for the National Bureau of Statistics, said on Wednesday.翻译:国家统计局新闻发言人刘爱华周三表示，房地产市场仍处于调整转型之中，经济复苏将出现“波折”。

Despite the lifting of strict COVID measures late last year and a slew of support measures, the world's second-biggest economy has struggled to get back on solid footing, largely due to weak consumer confidence and the deepening property crisis.翻译:尽管去年年底取消了严格的新冠疫情措施并采取了一系列支持措施，但世界第二大经济体仍难以恢复稳固的基础，这主要是由于消费者信心疲软和房地产危机不断加深。

"House prices are expected to continue to fall in the traditionally low season of November and December," said Zhang Dawei, analyst at property agency Centaline.翻译:中原地产分析师张大伟表示：“预计11月和12月的传统淡季房价将继续下跌。”

Zhang said property policies, especially in the first-tier cities, need to be stepped up.翻译:张说，房地产政策，特别是一线城市的房地产政策，需要加强。

China's central bank plans to provide at least $137 billion of low cost financing to the country's urban village renovation and affordable housing programmes.翻译:中国央行计划为城中村改造和保障性住房项目提供至少1370亿美元的低成本融资。

Reporting by Liangping Gao, Ella Cao and Ryan Woo; Editing by Jacqueline Wong翻译:高亮平、曹艾拉、吴瑞安报道；编辑：黄杰奎琳

item.title: 菲律宾拒绝中方关于派遣补给任务提前通知的要求
item.description:
The Philippines is not obliged to notify China about its resupply missions in the South China Sea, saying these operations, including the "upkeep" of a grounded navy ship are legitimate, its foreign ministry said on Thursday.翻译:菲律宾外交部周四表示，菲律宾没有义务就其在南海的补给任务通知中国，并称这些行动，包括“维护”一艘搁浅的海军舰艇是合法的。

The Department of Foreign Affairs (DFA) also called on China to remove all "illegal structures" it built within the Philippines' exclusive economic zone (EEZ), cease reclamation in those areas and be accountable for the damage the activities caused.翻译:外交部还呼吁中国拆除在菲律宾专属经济区（EEZ）内建造的所有“非法建筑”，停止在这些地区进行填海造地活动，并对这些活动造成的损害承担责任。

China has repeatedly accused the Philippines of illegally entering its waters without its permission during its missions to transport food and water to Filipino soldiers living aboard a navy ship that Manila grounded at the disputed Second Thomas Shoal. The atoll is called Ayungin by the Philippines and Renai Reef by China.翻译:中国一再指责菲律宾在执行向菲律宾搁浅在有争议的仁爱礁的一艘海军舰艇上的菲律宾士兵运送食物和水的任务期间，未经中国允许非法进入其水域。该环礁被菲律宾称为阿云金，中国被称为仁爱礁。

"We are being asked to give prior notification each time we conduct a resupply mission to Ayungin Shoal. We will not do so," DFA spokesperson Teresita Daza said in a statement.翻译:外交部发言人特雷西塔·达扎（Teresita Daza）在一份声明中表示：“每次前往阿云金浅滩执行补给任务时，我们都被要求提前通知。我们不会这样做。”

China claims sovereignty over nearly the entire South China Sea, pointing to a line on its maps that cuts into the EEZs of Vietnam, the Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei and Indonesia. Taiwan, which China claims as part of its territory, has also said it does not accept Beijing's maps.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，并指出其地图上有一条线切入了越南、菲律宾、马来西亚、文莱和印度尼西亚的专属经济区。中国声称是其领土一部分的台湾也表示不接受北京的地图。

The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said the line on China's maps had no legal basis, which Beijing rejects.翻译:2016年，常设仲裁法院表示，中国地图上的这条线没有法律依据，但北京方面对此予以否认。

US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin reiterated his support for the arbitral ruling during a meeting with his Manila counterpart in Jakarta. Both have denounced harassments by China towards Philippine vessels conducting the resupply mission.翻译:美国国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀在雅加达与马尼拉国防部长会面时重申了对仲裁裁决的支持。两人都谴责中国骚扰执行补给任务的菲律宾船只。

Since the grounding of the Sierra Madre ship at the atoll in 1999 in Manila's attempt to assert its sovereignty claim, China has repeatedly called on the Philippines to tow away the vessel, based on a supposed agreement, which Manila reiterated did not exist.翻译:自1999年马尼拉试图主张其主权主张而导致马德雷山脉船只在环礁搁浅以来，中国一再呼吁菲律宾根据所谓的协议拖走该船，但马尼拉重申该协议并不存在。

"The Philippines has not entered into any agreement abandoning its sovereign rights and jurisdiction over its EEZ and continental shelf, including in the vicinity of Ayungin Shoal," Daza said.翻译:达扎说：“菲律宾尚未签署任何放弃其专属经济区和大陆架主权权利和管辖权的协议，包括阿云金浅滩附近的地区。”

The Second Thomas Shoal lies 190 km (118 miles) off the Philippine island of Palawan, or well within the Manila's EEZ.翻译:仁爱礁距离菲律宾巴拉望岛 190 公里（118 英里），位于马尼拉专属经济区内。

China's embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

Reporting by Mikhail Flores and Neil Jerome Morales; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:米哈伊尔·弗洛雷斯和尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯的报道；编辑：拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南

item.title: 拜登表示向以色列明确表示占领加沙将是“大错误”
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden on Wednesday said he had made it clear to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that a two-state solution was the only answer to resolve the Israel-Palestinian conflict and that occupying Gaza would be "a big mistake."翻译:美国总统乔·拜登周三表示，他已向以色列总理本杰明·内塔尼亚胡明确表示，两国解决方案是解决以巴冲突的唯一答案，占领加沙将是“一个大错误”。

Biden told reporters he was doing everything in his power to free hostages held by the Hamas militant group in Gaza, but that did not mean sending in the U.S. military.翻译:拜登告诉记者，他正在尽一切努力解救加沙哈马斯武装组织扣押的人质，但这并不意味着派遣美军。

The U.S. president had told reporters this week that his message to the hostages was "Hang in there, we're coming," raising questions about what he meant.翻译:美国总统本周告诉记者，他向人质发出的信息是“坚持住，我们来了”，这引发了人们对他的意思的疑问。

Asked to clarify the comment, Biden told a news conference: "What I meant was, I'm doing everything in my power to get you out. Coming to help you, get you out. I don't mean sending in military in there ... I was not talking about the military."翻译:当被要求澄清这一评论时，拜登在新闻发布会上说：“我的意思是，我正在尽我所能让你出去。来帮助你，让你出去。我并不是说派军队去那里......我不是在谈论军队。”

Biden said he was working on the issue constantly, and would not stop until the hostages - including a three-year-old American child - were freed.翻译:拜登表示，他正在不断解决这个问题，在人质（包括一名三岁的美国儿童）获释之前不会停止。

Qatar, where Hamas operates a political office, has been leading mediation between the Islamist militant group and Israeli officials for the release of more than 240 hostages. They were taken by militants when they stormed into Israel on Oct. 7. Israel says 1,200 people were killed during the rampage.翻译:哈马斯政治办公室所在的卡塔尔一直在该伊斯兰激进组织与以色列官员之间进行调解，以释放 240 名人质。他们在 10 月 7 日冲进以色列时被武装分子抓获。以色列称，在这场暴乱中，有 1,200 人死亡。

Israel then launched an unrelenting bombardment of Hamas-ruled Gaza and late last month began an invasion of the enclave, where more than 11,000 people have been killed, around 40% of them children with more buried under the rubble, according to Palestinian officials.翻译:据巴勒斯坦官员称，以色列随后对哈马斯统治的加沙发动了无情的轰炸，并于上月底开始入侵该飞地，造成超过 11,000 人死亡，其中约 40% 是儿童，更多人被埋在废墟下。

Biden said Hamas was committing war crimes by having its military headquarters under a hospital, repeating a statement made a White House spokesperson on Tuesday, and he was confident about the U.S. intelligence supporting that "fact."翻译:拜登表示，哈马斯将其军事总部设在医院之下，犯下了战争罪，他重申了白宫发言人周二的声明，他对美国情报部门支持这一“事实”充满信心。

He said Israel had gone into Gaza's biggest hospital, Al Shifa, with a limited number of troops with guns, and was not carpet-bombing the site.翻译:他说，以色列带着数量有限的持枪部队进入了加沙最大的医院Al Shifa，并没有对现场进行地毯式轰炸。

"They were told ... we discussed the need for them to be incredibly careful," Biden said, adding that Israel had an obligation to use as much caution as possible in going after targets.翻译:拜登说：“他们被告知……我们讨论了他们需要非常小心的必要性。”他补充说，以色列有义务在追击目标时尽可能谨慎。

But he said it was "not realistic" to expect Israel to stop its military actions, given threats by senior Hamas officials that they intended to attack Israel again and their past "horrific" actions.翻译:但他表示，鉴于哈马斯高级官员威胁称他们打算再次袭击以色列以及他们过去的“可怕”行动，期望以色列停止军事行动“不现实”。

“Hamas has already said publicly that they plan on attacking Israel again, like they did before, where they cut babies’ heads off,” Biden said, reviving an assertion he made last month, when he said he had seen images of beheaded babies.翻译:“哈马斯已经公开表示，他们计划再次袭击以色列，就像以前那样，他们砍下了婴儿的头，”拜登说，重申了他上个月的说法，当时他说他看到了被斩首婴儿的图像。

The White House last month clarified that U.S. officials had not seen evidence of this, and said Biden was referring to news reports of such actions. It was not immediately clear if new intelligence had emerged confirming that babies were beheaded.翻译:白宫上个月澄清说，美国官员没有看到这方面的证据，并表示拜登指的是有关此类行动的新闻报道。目前尚不清楚是否有新情报证实婴儿被斩首。

On Wednesday, Biden said Israel was now bringing in incubators and other equipment to help people, and its soldiers giving doctors, nurses and other staff the opportunity to "get out of harm's way."翻译:拜登周三表示，以色列现在正在引进孵化器和其他设备来帮助人们，其士兵也为医生、护士和其他工作人员提供了“摆脱伤害”的机会。

Israel on Wednesday said its troops found Hamas weapons and combat gear in Al Shifa hospital during a search on Wednesday. Hamas dismissed the announcement as "lies."翻译:以色列周三表示，其部队在周三的搜查中在希法医院发现了哈马斯的武器和战斗装备。哈马斯驳斥了这一声明，称其为“谎言”。

Biden said he had told Netanyahu that he did not believe the war would end until a two-state solution was reached.翻译:拜登表示，他已告诉内塔尼亚胡，他认为在达成两国解决方案之前，战争不会结束。

"I made it clear to Israel that I think it's a big mistake to for them to occupy Gaza," he said.翻译:“我向以色列明确表示，我认为他们占领加沙是一个很大的错误，”他说。

Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt and Jeff Mason; Writing by Andrea Shalal; Editing by Sandra Maler & Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:特雷弗·亨尼卡特和杰夫·梅森的报道；安德里亚·沙拉尔 (Andrea Shalal) 撰写；桑德拉·马勒和西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔编辑

item.title: TikTok 与 Meta 一起对欧盟看门人地位提出上诉
item.description:
TikTok on Thursday joined Meta (META.O) in appealing against the "gatekeeper" status under the Digital Markets Act (DMA), an EU law that brings in tougher rules for tech companies and makes it easier for users to move between competing services.翻译:周四，TikTok 与 Meta (META.O)一起对《数字市场法案》 (DMA) 规定的“看门人”地位提出上诉，这项欧盟法律为科技公司带来了更严格的规则，并使用户更容易在竞争服务之间移动。

Meta on Wednesday challenged the "gatekeeper" designations for its Messenger and Marketplace platforms, but did not appeal against the status for Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp.翻译:Meta 周三对其 Messenger 和 Marketplace 平台的“看门人”称号提出质疑，但没有对 Facebook、Instagram 和 WhatsApp 的地位提出上诉。

The European Union in September picked 22 "gatekeeper" services, run by six tech companies - Microsoft (MSFT.O), Apple (AAPL.O), Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google, Amazon (AMZN.O), Meta and ByteDance's TikTok.翻译:9 月，欧盟挑选了 22 项“ 看门人”服务，由六家科技公司运营——微软(MSFT.O) 、苹果(AAPL.O) 、Alphabet (GOOGL.O)谷歌、亚马逊(AMZN.O) 、Meta 和字节跳动抖音。

While Microsoft, Google and Amazon did not challenge their designations, Apple is yet to comment on its plan. Nov. 16 is the last date to appeal.翻译:虽然微软、谷歌和亚马逊没有对他们的指定提出质疑，但苹果尚未对其计划发表评论。 11 月 16 日是上诉的最后日期。

"Our appeal is based on the belief that our designation risks undermining the DMA's own stated goal by protecting actual gatekeepers from newer competitors like TikTok," it said.翻译:“我们的上诉是基于这样的信念，即我们的指定可能会损害 DMA 自己既定的目标，因为它会保护实际的看门人免受 TikTok 等新竞争对手的侵害，”它表示。

"Far from being a gatekeeper, our platform, which has been operating in Europe for just over five years, is arguably the most capable challenger to more entrenched platform businesses."翻译:“我们的平台远非守门人，在欧洲运营仅五年多，可以说是更根深蒂固的平台业务最有能力的挑战者。”

The video sharing app said it does not meet the law's threshold for revenues generated in the European Economic Area of 7.5 billion euros ($8.13 billion) per annum.翻译:该视频共享应用程序表示，它不符合欧洲经济区每年 75 亿欧元（81.3 亿美元）收入的法律门槛。

Under the DMA, companies with more than 45 million monthly active users and a market capitalisation of 75 billion euros are considered gatekeepers providing a core platform service.翻译:根据 DMA，每月活跃用户超过 4500 万且市值达到 750 亿欧元的公司被视为提供核心平台服务的看门人。

The company said it was designated a gatekeeper based on its parent company, ByteDance's, global market capitalisation that us based primarily on the performance of business lines that do not even operate in Europe.翻译:该公司表示，它被指定为看门人是基于其母公司字节跳动的全球市值，而我们的全球市值主要基于甚至不在欧洲运营的业务线的业绩。

Last month, China's ByteDance bought back shares from U.S. employees in a deal that valued the company at $223.5 billion.翻译:上个月，中国字节跳动从美国员工手中回购了股份，该交易使该公司估值达到 2235 亿美元。

TikTok, which has over 134 million monthly users, said it is a challenger, not an incumbent, in digital advertising and no market investigation was conducted in relation to its designation by the European Commission.翻译:每月拥有超过 1.34 亿用户的 TikTok 表示，它是数字广告领域的挑战者，而不是现任者，并且没有针对欧盟委员会的指定进行市场调查。

($1 = 0.9223 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9223 欧元）

item.title: 台湾总统候选人提名美国高调特使作为竞选伙伴消息来源
item.description:
Lai Ching-te, the frontrunner for Taiwan's presidency, has picked Taipei's envoy to the United States - a fluent English speaker with deep connections in Washington - to be his running mate for January's election, sources with direct knowledge said.翻译:据直接知情人士透露，台湾总统大选的领跑者赖清德已选择台北驻美国特使——一位能说一口流利的英语，在华盛顿有着深厚人脉的人——作为他一月份选举的竞选搭档。

Lai, vice president and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party's (DPP) presidential candidate, has almost consistently led opinion polls ahead of an election taking place amid increased Chinese pressure on Taiwan to accept Beijing's sovereignty claims.翻译:由于中国对台湾施加越来越大的压力，要求其接受北京的主权主张，副总统兼执政的民进党（DPP）总统候选人赖智在选举前的民意调查中几乎一直领先。

Hsiao Bi-khim, 52, who has been Taiwan's de facto ambassador to the United States since 2020, has been considered by party officials, diplomats and Taiwanese media for months to the most likely running mate for Lai.翻译:52 岁的萧美琴自 2020 年以来一直担任台湾事实上的驻美国大使，几个月来，党内官员、外交官和台湾媒体一直认为他是黎智英最有可能的竞选搭档。

Now, that decision has been made, with a formal announcement coming on Monday once Hsiao returns to Taiwan from the APEC summit in San Francisco, four sources briefed on the matter told Reuters.翻译:四位知情人士告诉路透，现在这一决定已经做出，萧邦从旧金山亚太经合组织峰会返回台湾后，周一将正式宣布这一决定。

Hsiao, well known in the U.S. capital, can act as a key go-between for Taipei and Washington, the island's most important arms seller and international backer despite the absence of formal ties, one of the sources said.翻译:其中一位消息人士称，萧在美国首都很有名，可以充当台北和华盛顿之间的关键中间人，尽管没有正式联系，但华盛顿是台湾最重要的军火销售商和国际支持者。

"It's a crucial role and she has the needed international experience," said the source, speaking like the others on condition of anonymity as they were not authorised to speak to the media.翻译:“这是一个至关重要的角色，她拥有所需的国际经验，”该消息人士说，与其他人一样，该消息人士不愿透露姓名，因为他们无权接受媒体采访。

Vincent Chao, spokesperson for the Lai campaign, declined to comment on Hsiao's role but said an announcement on a running mate would be made on Monday.翻译:黎智英竞选团队发言人赵文山拒绝就萧的角色发表评论，但表示将于周一宣布竞选搭档。

"This candidate will reinforce our commitment to the people of Taiwan and the international community that democracy, peace, and prosperity will continue to be our guiding values," he said.翻译:他说：“这位候选人将加强我们对台湾人民和国际社会的承诺，即民主、和平与繁荣将继续成为我们的指导价值观。”

Ivan Kanapathy, who regularly met with Hsiao when he was Deputy Senior Director for Asia at the U.S. National Security Council, told Reuters that Hsiao is a "tireless advocate" for Taiwan.翻译:伊万·卡纳帕蒂(Ivan Kanapathy)在担任美国国家安全委员会亚洲事务副高级主任时经常与萧会面，他告诉路透社，萧是台湾的“不知疲倦的倡导者”。

"If Ambassador Hsiao becomes Vice President, her knowledge, experience, and relationships would be invaluable for national security and foreign policy in the next Taiwanese administration," said Kanapathy, now an adjunct professor at Georgetown University.翻译:“如果萧大使成为副总统，她的知识、经验和关系对于下一届台湾政府的国家安全和外交政策将是无价的，”现任乔治城大学兼职教授的卡纳帕西说。

Hsiao has been "very engaged on Taiwan's defence reform efforts, which are drawing on lessons from Ukraine," he said, pointing to examples such as initiatives for Taiwan to acquire more munitions, including Patriot missiles and drones.翻译:他说，萧一直“非常积极地参与台湾的国防改革努力，这些改革正在吸取乌克兰的教训”，并举了一些例子，例如台湾购买更多弹药的举措，包括爱国者导弹和无人机。

Randall Schriver, the former U.S. assistant secretary of defense for Indo-Pacific Security Affairs, described Hsiao as a "good partner in promoting U.S.-Taiwan relations."翻译:美国负责印太安全事务的前助理国防部长兰德尔·施里弗形容萧是“促进美台关系的好伙伴”。

"If Ambassador Hsiao becomes Vice President, there is no doubt this will be to the benefit of U.S.-Taiwan relations," said Schriver, leads the Project 2049 Institute, a think tank. Schriver added that he takes no position in the Taiwan campaign.翻译:“如果萧大使成为副总统，毫无疑问这将有利于美台关系，”智库“2049计划”研究所负责人施里弗说。施里弗补充说，他在台湾竞选活动中不持任何立场。

The DPP champions Taiwan's separate identity from China. The DPP-led government says only Taiwan's people can decide their future, and has repeatedly offered talks with Beijing but been rebuffed.翻译:民进党主张台湾与中国的独立身份。民进党领导的政府表示，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来，并多次提出与北京进行会谈，但遭到拒绝。

Lai has during the past week talked up Hsiao in interviews with local media, without directly confirming he had picked her, calling her "very principled" and "thorough" and that he had always admired her.翻译:过去一周，黎智英在接受当地媒体采访时谈到了萧，但没有直接证实他选择了她，称她“非常有原则”和“彻底”，并且他一直很欣赏她。

Hsiao was born in Japan to a Taiwanese father and American mother and initially worked in the office of then-president Chen Shui-bian, also from the DPP, and then as a DPP lawmaker.翻译:萧出生于日本，父亲是台湾人，母亲是美国人，最初在同样出身民进党的时任总统陈水扁的办公室工作，后来成为民进党议员。

Like Lai, Hsiao is detested by China, which has on two occasions placed sanctions on her, most recently in April, saying she is an "independence diehard".翻译:和黎智英一样，萧也受到中国的憎恶，中国曾两次对她实施制裁，最近一次是在四月，称她是“独立顽固分子”。

China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Wednesday referred to Lai and Hsiao as an "independence double act" and that Taiwan's people are "very clear" about what them teaming up means for the "situation in the Taiwan Strait". It did not elaborate.翻译:中国台湾事务办公室周三称赖和萧是“独立双重行为”，台湾人民“非常清楚”他们的联手对“台海局势”意味着什么。它没有详细说明。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard and Yimou Lee; Additional reporting by Michael Martina in Washington. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:Ben Blanchard 和 Yimou Lee 报道；迈克尔·马丁纳在华盛顿的补充报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 美国、中国和东南亚防务官员在危机中会面
item.description:
Defence ministers and officials from the United States, China, Russia and Southeast Asia gathered in Indonesia on Thursday for a meeting where they are expected to discuss geopolitical crises in and outside the region.翻译:来自美国、中国、俄罗斯和东南亚的国防部长和官员周四齐聚印度尼西亚举行会议，预计他们将讨论该地区内外的地缘政治危机。

Defence ministers in Southeast Asia's regional bloc ASEAN called on Wednesday for a ceasefire in Gaza and a durable solution in Myanmar, as conflicts are deepening there.翻译:东南亚地区集团东盟的国防部长周三呼吁加沙停火，并在缅甸寻求持久解决方案，因为那里的冲突正在加深。

"Indonesia is of the view that the region's multiple security issues, ranging from traditional and non-traditional threats, can only be solved by extensive open and inclusive global collaboration," Prabowo Subianto, Indonesia's defence minister said in an opening speech on Thursday.翻译:印度尼西亚国防部长普拉博沃·苏比安托 (Prabowo Subianto) 在周四的开幕致辞中表示：“印度尼西亚认为，该地区的多重安全问题，包括传统威胁和非传统威胁，只能通过广泛开放和包容的全球合作来解决。”

Prabowo did not mention any specific issues in the speech, but he named on Wednesday the South China Sea, the Korean Peninsula and Myanmar as "hot spots that can destabilise the region."翻译:普拉博沃在讲话中没有提及任何具体问题，但他周三将南海、朝鲜半岛和缅甸列为“可能破坏该地区稳定的热点地区”。

Among those attending are U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin, Russia's Deputy Defence Minister Alexander Fomin and Jing Jianfeng, China's deputy chief of staff of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission.翻译:出席会议的包括美国国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀、俄罗斯国防部副部长亚历山大·福明和中国中央军委联合参谋部副参谋长景剑锋。

Other countries participating on Thursday are Australia, New Zealand and others, while Myanmar is absent.翻译:周四参加的其他国家有澳大利亚、新西兰等，但缅甸缺席。

Myanmar's generals have been barred from high-level meetings of the 10-member ASEAN since they seized power in a 2021 coup and unleashed violence on those who challenged their takeover.翻译:自从缅甸在 2021 年政变中夺取政权并向那些挑战其接管权的人发动暴力以来，缅甸将军们一直被禁止参加由 10 个成员国组成的东盟高级别会议。

The meeting comes as U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping met on Wednesday on the outskirts of San Francisco, where they agreed to resume military-to-military communications and work to curb fentanyl production.翻译:这次会议召开之际，美国总统乔·拜登和中国领导人习近平周三在旧金山郊区会面，同意恢复军队间的沟通并努力遏制芬太尼的生产。

Indonesia and Malaysia have also called for a ceasefire in the ongoing conflict in Gaza. Visiting Washington this week, Indonesian President Joko Widodo pressed Biden to do more to end Israel's war with Hamas.翻译:印度尼西亚和马来西亚也呼吁加沙持续冲突停火。印度尼西亚总统佐科·维多多本周访问华盛顿， 敦促拜登采取更多措施结束以色列与哈马斯的战争。

Reporting by Stanley Widianto; Editing by Lincoln Feast翻译:斯坦利·维迪安托报道；林肯·盛宴编辑

item.title: 跨太平洋贸易协定成员在亚太经合组织峰会上举行会议，表示对新成员开放
item.description:
Trade ministers from members of an Asian free trade pact abandoned by the United States affirmed on Wednesday a desire for more countries to join the bloc if they can meet its standards.翻译:周三，被美国放弃的亚洲自由贸易协定成员国的贸易部长确认，如果更多国家能够达到该协定的标准，他们希望更多国家加入该协定。

The officials from the 12 Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) countries met in San Francisco just after trade negotiations for the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework (IPEF) initiative ground to a halt without an agreement this week.翻译:本周，美国主导的印度-太平洋经济框架（IPEF）倡议的贸易谈判因未达成协议而陷入停顿，随后来自跨太平洋伙伴关系全面进步协定（CPTPP）12个国家的官员在旧金山举行会议。

The lack of an IPEF trade deal is a setback for the Biden administration. It had aimed to showcase the initiative during this week's Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in San Francisco as a symbol of its economic re-engagement in Asia, providing countries a counterweight to China's growing clout in the region.翻译:缺乏 IPEF 贸易协议对拜登政府来说是一个挫折。它的目的是在本周于旧金山举行的亚太经济合作组织（APEC）峰会上展示该倡议，作为其重新参与亚洲经济的象征，为各国提供抗衡中国在该地区日益增长的影响力的举措。

The CPTPP is the successor to the Trans-Pacific Partnership free trade deal, from which former President Donald Trump withdrew as soon as he took office in 2017.翻译:CPTPP是跨太平洋伙伴关系自由贸易协定的继承者，前总统唐纳德·特朗普在2017年上任后就退出了该协定。

The CPTPP meeting on the sidelines of the APEC leaders' summit was the first ministerial to include new member Britain, which signed up to the trade bloc in July.翻译:在 APEC 领导人峰会期间举行的 CPTPP 会议是首次有新成员英国参加的部长级会议，英国于 7 月签署了该贸易协定。

In a joint statement posted on the UK trade ministry website, the ministers "reaffirmed that the CPTPP is open to accession requests by economies that are ready to meet the high standards of the agreement and have a demonstrated pattern of complying with trade commitments."翻译:在英国贸易部网站上发布的一份联合声明中，部长们“重申，CPTPP 对那些准备好满足协议高标准并具有遵守贸易承诺模式的经济体的加入请求持开放态度。”

The statement made no mention of China's application to join the bloc, nor applications by Taiwan, Costa Rica and Ecuador.翻译:声明没有提及中国的入盟申请，也没有提及台湾、哥斯达黎加和厄瓜多尔的申请。

It said accession decisions are dependent upon consensus, and since July, they have been "gathering information on whether aspirant economies can meet CPTPP’s high standards."翻译:报告称，加入决定取决于共识，自7月以来，他们一直在“收集有关有抱负的经济体是否能够满足CPTPP高标准的信息”。

Information collected to date "will not prejudge any process, outcome, decision and/or actions to be taken by CPTPP members," it said, adding that the bloc would apply lessons learned in the UK accession.翻译:声明称，迄今为止收集的信息“不会预先判断 CPTPP 成员将采取的任何过程、结果、决定和/或行动”，并补充说，欧盟将借鉴英国加入时吸取的经验教训。

The current CPTPP members are Australia, Brunei, Canada, Chile, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Peru, Singapore, the United Kingdom, and Vietnam. Most overlap with both APEC and the IPEF initiative.翻译:目前CPTPP成员包括澳大利亚、文莱、加拿大、智利、日本、马来西亚、墨西哥、新西兰、秘鲁、新加坡、英国和越南。大多数与 APEC 和 IPEF 倡议重叠。

Reporting by David Lawder; Editing by Lincoln Feast.翻译:大卫·劳德报道；林肯·盛宴编辑。

item.title: 要点 - 拜登和习近平会面：台湾、伊朗、芬太尼和人工智能
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden and China's Xi Jinping met for about four hours on Wednesday to discuss issues ranging from military conflicts to drug-trafficking.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平周三会面约四个小时，讨论从军事冲突到贩毒等一系列问题。

Biden welcomed the Chinese leader at the Filoli estate, a country house and gardens about 30 miles (48 km) south of San Francisco, ahead of a summit of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum.翻译:在亚太经济合作组织 (APEC) 论坛峰会召开之前，拜登在位于旧金山以南约 30 英里（48 公里）的菲洛丽庄园欢迎中国领导人。菲洛丽庄园是一座乡村别墅和花园。

Here's the key issues discussed.

TAIWAN

The two leaders had a "substantial" discussion on Taiwan, with Xi telling Biden that Taiwan was the biggest, most dangerous issue facing the two superpowers, a senior U.S. official told reporters.翻译:一位美国高级官员告诉记者，两位领导人就台湾问题进行了“实质性”讨论，习近平告诉拜登，台湾是两个超级大国面临的最大、最危险的问题。

The Chinese leader said that China had no plans for military action against Taiwan in coming years, but also discussed conditions under which force could be used, the official said.翻译:这位官员表示，这位中国领导人表示，中国没有计划在未来几年对台湾采取军事行动，但也讨论了可以使用武力的条件。

Biden said he "stressed the importance of peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait." He also asked Xi to respect Taiwan's electoral process, the U.S. official said.翻译:拜登表示，他“强调了台海和平与稳定的重要性”。这位美国官员表示，他还要求习近平尊重台湾的选举程序。

Xi responded: "Look, peace is ... all well and good but at some point we need to move towards resolution more generally," the U.S. official said.

MILITARY TALKS

Beijing said the two leaders agreed to resume military contacts that China severed after then-House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan in August 2022.翻译:北京表示，两国领导人同意恢复中国在时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西于 2022 年 8 月访问台湾后中断的军事接触。

Biden made a "very clear request" that both countries institutionalize the military-to-military dialogues, and U.S. Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin will meet his Chinese counterpart when that person is named, a senior U.S. official said.

LEADER TO LEADER TALKS

Biden said he and Xi agreed to high-level communications.翻译:拜登表示，他和习近平同意进行高层沟通。

"He and I agreed that each one of us can pick up the phone call directly and we'll be heard immediately," Biden told reporters after the meeting.

COOPERATION AND CONCILIATION

Beijing's report of the meeting, via the Communist Party-controlled Chinese state media, emphasized the need for more cooperation, dialogue and respect. China and the United States should set an example for other countries, Xi told Biden, according to Chinese media, and promote cooperation on trade, agriculture, climate change and artificial intelligence.翻译:北京通过共产党控制的中国官方媒体对这次会议进行了报道，强调需要更多的合作、对话和尊重。据中国媒体报道，习近平告诉拜登，中美两国应为其他国家树立榜样，推动贸易、农业、气候变化和人工智能等领域的合作。

An official briefed on the talks said Beijing was also seeking a show of respect from the trip.

FENTANYL

Biden and Xi agreed to cooperate on addressing the source of the opioid fentanyl, a leading cause of drug overdoses in the United States, the U.S. official said.翻译:这位美国官员表示，拜登和习近平同意合作解决阿片类药物芬太尼的来源问题，阿片类药物芬太尼是美国吸毒过量的主要原因。

Under the agreement, China will go directly after specific chemical companies that make fentanyl precursors.

IRAN

The two leaders also discussed the unfolding crisis in the Middle East, with Biden asking China to weigh in with Iran and urge it to avoid steps that could be seen as provocative, the senior U.S. official told reporters.翻译:这位美国高级官员告诉记者，两位领导人还讨论了中东正在发生的危机，拜登要求中国对伊朗发表意见，并敦促其避免采取可能被视为挑衅的行动。

Chinese officials told the U.S. side that they had engaged in discussions with Iran on regional risks.

ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

The two leaders also discussed artificial intelligence (AI)and agreed that AI was used in military or nuclear operations, it created real risks.翻译:两位领导人还讨论了人工智能（AI），并一致认为人工智能用于军事或核行动，会带来真正的风险。

The senior U.S. official said both sides were "very much focused" on practices regarding AI that could be dangerous or destabilizing, but not ready for any mutual declaration.翻译:这位美国高级官员表示，双方“非常关注”可能危险或破坏稳定的人工智能做法，但尚未准备好相互宣布。
